name: francescoboccia_5_14jan2021
description: Installation Clone this repo. From within the project folder, run npm install.  You can then run the server with node server from within the "backend" subfolder.  The server should run on localhost with default port 3000.  If the server runs on another port for any reason, this is printed to the console when the server starts, e.g. Listening on port 3001.
